EmailTemplate.description: Notifies DOER installer that contract has been fully executed
EmailTemplate.name: Doer Installer - Contract Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name}'s Mass Solar Loan contract is complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c},
The Solar Loan contract for {!Opportunity.Name} has been fully executed. We will disburse the first 35% of the funds to you shortly. The final 65% disbursal for this loan will be sent upon receiving project completion from the MassCEC portal.
Important Next Step: Please report the system as interconnected. This document can be uploaded by logging in to your BlueWave Solar Loan Portal, going to the Customer and completing the Interconnection Documentation task.
BlueWave Partner Support (888) 817 - 2703 partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
